    1. Overall

    pasSHA is a perfectly Safe Password Manager and Generator, that will allow User,
while remembering only one Password, maintain different Passwords for all the WEB
and beyond.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------   
    3. Contacts

    In case of discovered issues or desired features please contact 
andrejs.lubimovs@gmail.com
vlad.varslavans@gmail.com

Following information in bug report is welcomed:
    1) Description of a problem:
        a) What happened? describe it in common language 
        b) What you were doing? describe what you were trying to do
    2) Log files (stored in path/to/passha/logs/)
